Instruction: Add garlic and cook for an additional minute, stirring frequently.
Gradually mix in the curry powder until fully incorporated.

Add the chicken; lower the heat to low, cover, and cook until the chicken is cooked through with no pink remaining and the juices run clear, taking 20 to 40 minutes. An instant-read thermometer placed in the center should show at least 165 degrees F (74 degrees C).
Uncover and cook, stirring continuously to avoid burning, until the pan juices have reduced to the desired level, around 3 to 5 minutes.
